      • doAddPortlet

        public String doAddPortlet(AddPortletRequest event,
                           PortalSession portalSession)
                    throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractPortlet

        Called by AbstractPortlet.onAddPortletRequest(org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.AddPortletRequest, org.jgrapes.portal.base.PortalSession) to complete adding the portlet. If the portlet has associated state, the implementation should call AbstractPortlet.putInSession(Session, String, Serializable) to create the state and put it in the session.

        Specified by:
        doAddPortlet in class AbstractPortlet
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        portalSession - the channel
        Returns:
        the id of the created portlet
        Throws:
        Exception

      • doDeletePortlet

        protected void doDeletePortlet(DeletePortletRequest event,
                               PortalSession portalSession,
                               String portletId,
                               Serializable retrievedState)
                        throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractPortlet

        Called by AbstractPortlet.onDeletePortletRequest(org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.DeletePortletRequest, org.jgrapes.portal.base.PortalSession) to complete deleting the portlet. If the portlet component wants to veto the deletion of the portlet, it puts the state information back in the session with AbstractPortlet.putInSession(Session, String, Serializable) and does not fire the DeletePortlet event.

        Specified by:
        doDeletePortlet in class AbstractPortlet
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        portalSession - the channel
        portletId - the portlet id
        retrievedState - the portlet state
        Throws:
        Exception
